org.security.crypt

Class FileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.security.crypt.FileHelper

  • public class FileHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helps with naming and creating file-based streams.
    Author:
    shivam

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getFileName

        public static java.lang.String getFileName(java.lang.String basename,
                                           Algorithm algorithm,
                                           java.lang.String type)
        Gets a file name that includes all the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        basename - Base name of file.
        algorithm - Cryptographic algorithm.
        type - Type of data in file. May be null to indicate raw data.
        Returns:
        File name.

      • getIn

        Gets an input stream for the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        basename - Base name of file.
        algorithm - Cryptographic algorithm.
        type - Type of data in file. May be null to indicate raw data.
        Returns:
        File input stream.

      • getOut

        public static java.io.OutputStream getOut(java.lang.String basename,

        Gets an output stream for the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        basename - Base name of file.
        algorithm - Cryptographic algorithm.
        type - Type of data in file. May be null to indicate raw data.
        Returns:
        File output stream.

      • equal

        public static boolean equal(java.io.File a,
                            java.io.File b)
        Determines whether the contents of two files are equal by hashing their contents and comparing the resulting hash.
        Parameters:
        a - File.
        b - File.
        Returns:
        True if file contents are equal, false otherwise.

      • equal

        public static boolean equal(java.io.InputStream a,
                            java.io.InputStream b)
        Determines whether the contents of two streams are equal by hashing their contents and comparing the resulting hash.
        Parameters:
        a - Input stream.
        b - Input stream.
        Returns:
        True if stream contents are equal, false otherwise.
